__e: Let us not forget it was out of hope of something good and right.
And it could have been for us, too.
Oh, I wish you weren't... whatever it is you are.
I'd lost hope of being able to help my father... Until I found you.
And I'm here in hopes that I can be yours.
And you... You gave me hope... I could have more.
On your own, your life expectancy is like here.
Apparently, this was more than a dying man's hope against hope.
I've killed a man who used to be his friend, and now I'm out there every day slowly killing another man... who used to be his friend, in order to catch another guy... who used to be his friend.
My only hope is that there's something bigger than this world.
That's what I'm hoping the old man can tell us.
It is my most fervent hope that there will not be.
If there's any hope, it's that way.
She is your hope... your everything.
It is my most fervent hope that there will not be.
Hope you'll find a woman better than me.
The only solace you should take from this is the fact that it didn't.
I'm hoping you'll know about one of them.
Our only hope is to find safe ground to protect what few of us remain.
You're trying to give me hope, take my mind off of what's going on down on that planet.
"but they are old, and I am young and full of hope "and love for my country and my times."
- I understand that hope is very important to you right now.
Sometimes hope is all you have left.
That's the day that every witch gives a gift to the city in the hopes that the city gives one back.
There's a hope that people are going to understand the things that you did.
And with the memories came hope that life could be fun again.
With the hope that someday we may truly live in a world of liberty and justice for all.
She still holds out hope too that someday, she and I can find our way back to each other.
Hmm. And seeing what a great family you and Jessica have, it gives me hope that one day I could find that with somebody, too.
I don't know who you are, but you're our only hope.
I've never hoped that in my life.
Letting go of him... the hope that... he was the father that I wanted him to be.
Now, we need to take you back to the center to have sex to see if there is hope for the rest of us and for the future.
Just being around a leaving dad gives me hope for the future. Right?
There's still hope for the kids inside of all of us.
-Made by me. I hope for you that this is not Error.
Maybe There'S Hope For You After All.
There is still hope, for you and your child.
There's still hope, for her and for you.
And... if you can come from someone like me? Well, that just proves that there's hope.
There's hope for us all, then, I guess.
And that's hope right there, isn't it?
There is no hope. There is none!
